results.title: Live, Love, Laugh Crop Hoodie
results.description:
Nothing looks more stylish and chic than a well-designed crop hoodie. As such, this one won’t disappoint. It’s not just a super stylish crop-top hoodie, it is also super comfy due to being made from soft three-end fleece with ultra tight-knit construction. It’s that tight-knitting that makes printed surfaces really stand out.
.: 85% combed ringspun cotton, 15% polyester
.: Medium fabric (7.0 oz /yd² (240 g/m²))
.: Relaxed fit
.: Raw bottom hem
.: Soft 3-end fleece

results.title: Dont Be a Dick Wooden Sign, Funny Wood Sign, Presents For Boyfriend, Presents For Mom
results.description:
Live, Laugh, Love.. wait, you know what ? *scratches that out* How about.. we just.. Don't be a Dick ? 

This funny wooden sign displays white vinyl lettering scrawled across beautifully dark coffee stained wood, and a layer of varnish for added protection.
This gem’s rustic, primitive style is gorgeous yet imperfect.. kinda like you and I. Rock this gorgeous sign on any wall or shelf in the home, and get ready to see your guests smile (and jealous!)
This piece also makes for an excellent gift.

•Approximately 16" x 3.5” to 5”

•It is important to note that each piece of wood is different, especially when salvaging and working with recycled wood. This means that each woody goodie may vary ever so slightly in look and size, but will still be just as awesome as the last. (Maybe even more so !)

results.title: Live Laugh Love Wall Decal Live Every Moment Laugh Every Day Love Beyond Words Quote Saying Bedroom Living Room Wall Art Decor Family Room
results.description:
Pick a size and color. Ships from Ohio, Made in the USA, excellent quality!

Live every moment, Laugh every day, Love beyond words.

The wall photo is a brown decal on a Khaki colored wall. I made the smaller one and placed it on my wall so you can see how it looks on the wall. The brown on the white background is before i applied it to the wall laying on my work table.

These are the actual decals i made. (not photo-shopped)  It will look awesome on your walls behind your sofa or in the entryway of your home as a focal point.

The vinyl has a matte finish and looks like it is professionally painted on. It does remove with no sticky mess or residue but can't be reused.

It is made with Oracal wall vinyl and is safe to use on your interior walls. Will not damage paint. see below

***Oracal says,

This 3-year film (vinyl decal) removes cleanly and easily for up to 2 years after application. It's an ideal choice for short-to medium-term indoor graphics like tradeshow and museum displays and exhibition. The matte surface suppresses unwanted reflections. ***

We use this type of Oracal for indoor walls so you can decorate as often as you wish. Change it up every couple of years for a fun loving home that is stylish and unique! The decals allow you to pick a unique style and dress it up to your preference at a low cost with lots of style.

It does not leave a sticky mess on the walls and removes cleanly and easily. We only use this type of vinyl for indoor walls.

WHAT YOU GET-----

This item comes with easy step by step instruction's to apply it easily to any smooth, flat, clean, surface. We also supply you with a small practice decal for an easy application to your surface. 

To order pick a size and color,
 
then click Green ADD TO CART--->>>>

SHIPPING-------------

This item ships via priority mail with a 2-3 day expected delivery. We ship with insurance and a tracker so your items are safe. We never fold your decal. It is shipped to arrive beautiful with no marks or creases, rolled in a strong tube to keep it safe..

We ship 6 days a week so you get it faster, we like to ship same day or next morning.

If you need a custom size or style just let us know and we are happy to make it for you.

results.title: Reusable Face Mask, Hot peppers Face Mask, Pepper fabric, washable face cover, chili peppers mask
results.description:
This listing is for one (1) hot pepper themed washable face mask.

Hand made face mask has 3 layers, 2 layers of 100% quilting grade  cotton fabric and one layer of cotton flannel in the middle.  There is a  soft 1/4" elastic ear strip. Pleated for a contoured fit. Mask should fit most adults

Face mask is for your personal protection and is not medical grade. There may be variations with fabric patterns. 

Size: 8 1/2 “ (w) x 4 “  (h)

Care: Wash mask upon receiving and after every use with soap and water, lay flat to dry. Can be ironed, except for the elastic.

results.title: 8 Sets of Clear Stamps for Scrapbooking, Cards and Crafts (32 Stamps)
results.description:
A grouping of 7 packages of clear stamps for cardmaking, scrapbooking and other crafts.  There are 27 stamps varying from 1/4" to 2".  There are sayings, birds, flowers, Easter, Spring, floral, wedding/love, geometric and bird items included.  5 of the packages are unopened and the other gently used and in good condition.  The floral, birthday, thanks, hello package is missing one of the flowers, but the others are complete.  These are used with a clear acrylic block not included.  They stick onto the block for usage and then are returned to their packages.  A great variety for lots of occasions including spring and Easter.  

From a no pet non smoking home.

results.title: Not All Who Wander | Pillow Cover | Throw Pillow | JRR Tolkien | Room Decor | Home Decor | Bedroom Decor | Decorative Pillows for Couch
results.description:
100% Hand Made.  Made in America.

Trivia time! Did you know J.R.R. Tolkien, author of "The Lord of the Rings" stories, wrote this quote? Well, will this pillow print, you'll never forget, especially if you pack it with you on all of your favorite camper van roadtrips and excursions! Printed on a soft beige material with a vintaged background, this pillow is easy to match in any decor but fits best in a sophisticated, literature lover's nest!

NOTE: INSERT NOT included, Sold Separately

DETAILS:
    1 Accent Pillow Cover
    Size:        Approx 10x10,12x12,14x14,16x16,18x18,20x20
    Cover Front:  Not all who wander are lost
    Cover Back:   Plain Medium Beige
    Closure: Concealed Zipper
    Fabric:   Cotton / Polyester Blend - Neatly woven, sturdy material
    Other:    Re-enforced zipper opening ends.
                    Sewn-over Edges
                    Quality checked, inside and out.

CARE SUGGESTIONS:
    - Spot Clean or Hand Wash, do not bleach.  Lay flat or hang to dry.
    - Touch up with warm, not hot iron, preferably over a slightly damp press cloth, if needed.

Inserts can be ordered through us, or bought at local craft stores.

TIP on SIZE of INSERT to Buy:
-  For a fuller look, Insert should ideally be 1" to 2" larger for Covers 16" and up.
   i.e: For a 17"x 17" Pillow Cover, you may want to use a 18"x 18" Insert.
-  For Covers 14" and smaller, Insert should ideally be the same size.

Instructions on properly inserting an insert into cover are included with every Pillow Cover Order.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Scrabble Stainless Jewelry - Choose Letter, Pendant, Necklace or Keychain - Quality Stainless - Live Laugh Love Gift Idea
results.description:
***If you are looking for a quality necklace, pendant or keychain, than my stainless pieces are perfect for your needs.  The beauty of stainless is, it will not tarnish, is very durable and hypoallergenic. The chain (18"), lobster clasp, jump rings and screw-eye bails are quality 316 stainless steel.***

***Also personalize your necklace by choosing what letter is on the back.  Match a first, last name or anything you want. If you want your chain shorter than 18" just convo me.***

***An upcycled wood scrabble game tile piece has been used with an artistic image. The image is protected with a shiny "glass-like" epoxy resin sticker.

***Perhaps you want a different image on the front.  I can work with any image in my shop, even your ideas.  Convo me for details and I will make it happen.

***The pendant measures about 3/4 inch (1.9cm). The all important "scrabble letter" on the back can be chosen by you.  Match a first or last name with the scrabble letter.

***Pendants are very light around your neck and a very unique piece of art to wear. Fun ways to express yourself. A great and fun gift to give to yourself or others.

***Product Care: Water resistant.  Not intended for small children.

***Your order is shipping within 1-3 business days. I ship usps first class mail in US (2-5 days).

***Arrives packaged for protection and ready for gift giving.

***Check out other great items in my shop:  https://www.etsy.com/shop/MaDGreenCreations?ref=seller-platform

Contact me with any questions...I want your experience with my shop to be wonderful!
